title: Prince Harry 'mocked by his mates for waxing his chest to impress girlfriend Meghan Markle'
text:
Prince Harry 'mocked by his mates for waxing his chest to impress girlfriend Meghan Markle' It looks like the royal has decided to ditch his rugged look for his new love Share Grooming: Prince Harry (Photo: Getty Images/GC Images)     
Prince Harry has reportedly been ribbed by his pals for waxing his chest. 
Ever since meeting stunning US girfriend Meghan Markle , the smitten royal is believed to be regularly getting rid of his chest hair. 
Harry, 32, and Meghan started dating over the summer and she’s already met his nearest and dearest - including his close circle of friends at a wedding in the Caribbean last week. 
Speaking about Harry’s hair removal habits, a source said he’s been getting a lot of stick about it from his friends. 
They told The Sun: “Harry has been seen as a ‘man’s man’ all his adult life, so this has come as a shock to friends. Prince Harry (Photo: Collect Unknown) 
“They all think his new grooming methods are down to his desire to look his shiny best for Meghan. 
"His chest is now like something you’d see from guys in Baywatch - but without the tan.” 
Last week, the couple attended the wedding of Harry’s best friend and wingman Tom ‘Skippy’ Inskip in Montego Bay, Jamaica. (Photo: PA) 
And their affectionate displays of affection left guests wondering if there might be another royal wedding on the cards soon. 
It was the first time the 32-year-old prince, who acted as an usher, had taken actress Meghan , 35, to such a social event surrounded by close friends. Meghan Markle (Photo: PA) 
Afterwards, one wedding insider told the Mirror: “While Harry and Meghan only had eyes for Tom and Lara, many of the guests were watching the royal couple in awe. 
“Everyone could see they have a real chemistry between them, as if they’ve known each other a long time. 
“Throughout the day Meghan was putting her arm round Harry, holding his hand and often kissing him. Prince Harry and Tom Inskip (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
"His inner circles of friends say they have never seen him so smitten and believe it is a question of sooner rather than later as to when Harry proposes." 
Ironically Jamaica is where Meghan wed her first husband movie producer Trevor Engelson. The marriage lasted two years. Like us on Facebook
